azure-blob-storage-container.name: Azure Blob Storage Container
azure-blob-storage-container.description:
Represents a container in Azure Blob Storage.

This class provides methods for downloading and uploading files and folders
to and from the Azure Blob Storage container. This block is part of the prefect-azure collection. Install prefect-azure with `pip install prefect-azure` to use this block.

fields.description:
Represents a container in Azure Blob Storage.

This class provides methods for downloading and uploading files and folders
to and from the Azure Blob Storage container.

container_name.description: The name of a Azure Blob Storage container.
container_name.title: Container Name

credentials.description: The credentials to use for authentication with Azure.

base_folder.description: A base path to a folder within the container to use for reading and writing objects.
base_folder.title: Base Folder

fields.title: AzureBlobStorageContainer

AzureBlobStorageCredentials.description: Stores credentials for authenticating with Azure Blob Storage.

connection_string.description: The connection string to your Azure storage account. If provided, the connection string will take precedence over the account URL.
connection_string.title: Connection String

account_url.description: The URL for your Azure storage account. If provided, the account URL will be used to authenticate with the discovered default Azure credentials.
account_url.title: Account URL

AzureBlobStorageCredentials.title: AzureBlobStorageCredentials

azure-blob-storage-credentials.name: Azure Blob Storage Credentials
azure-blob-storage-credentials.description: Stores credentials for authenticating with Azure Blob Storage. This block is part of the prefect-azure collection. Install prefect-azure with `pip install prefect-azure` to use this block.
azure-blob-storage-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Azure Blob Storage credentials and retrieve a blob service client:
```python
from prefect_azure import AzureBlobStorageCredentials

azure_credentials_block = AzureBlobStorageCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")

blob_service_client = azure_credentials_block.get_blob_client()
```

fields.description: Stores credentials for authenticating with Azure Blob Storage.

connection_string.description: The connection string to your Azure storage account. If provided, the connection string will take precedence over the account URL.
connection_string.title: Connection String

account_url.description: The URL for your Azure storage account. If provided, the account URL will be used to authenticate with the discovered default Azure credentials.
account_url.title: Account URL

fields.title: AzureBlobStorageCredentials

azure-container-instance-credentials.name: Azure Container Instance Credentials
azure-container-instance-credentials.description:
Block used to manage Azure Container Instances authentication. Stores Azure Service
Principal authentication data. This block is part of the prefect-azure collection. Install prefect-azure with `pip install prefect-azure` to use this block.

fields.description:
Block used to manage Azure Container Instances authentication. Stores Azure Service
Principal authentication data.

client_id.description: The service principal client ID. If none of client_id, tenant_id, and client_secret are provided, will use DefaultAzureCredential; else will need to provide all three to use ClientSecretCredential.
client_id.title: Client ID

tenant_id.description: The service principal tenant ID.If none of client_id, tenant_id, and client_secret are provided, will use DefaultAzureCredential; else will need to provide all three to use ClientSecretCredential.
tenant_id.title: Tenant ID

client_secret.description: The service principal client secret.If none of client_id, tenant_id, and client_secret are provided, will use DefaultAzureCredential; else will need to provide all three to use ClientSecretCredential.
client_secret.title: Client Secret

credential_kwargs.description: Additional keyword arguments to pass to `ClientSecretCredential` or `DefaultAzureCredential`.
credential_kwargs.title: Additional Credential Keyword Arguments

fields.title: AzureContainerInstanceCredentials

azure-cosmos-db-credentials.name: Azure Cosmos DB Credentials
azure-cosmos-db-credentials.description:
Block used to manage Cosmos DB authentication with Azure.
Azure authentication is handled via the `azure` module through
a connection string. This block is part of the prefect-azure collection. Install prefect-azure with `pip install prefect-azure` to use this block.
azure-cosmos-db-credentials.code_example:
Load stored Azure Cosmos DB credentials:
```python
from prefect_azure import AzureCosmosDbCredentials
azure_credentials_block = AzureCosmosDbCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.description:
Block used to manage Cosmos DB authentication with Azure.
Azure authentication is handled via the `azure` module through
a connection string.
fields.title: AzureCosmosDbCredentials

azureml-credentials.name: AzureML Credentials
azureml-credentials.description:
Block used to manage authentication with AzureML. Azure authentication is
handled via the `azure` module. This block is part of the prefect-azure collection. Install prefect-azure with `pip install prefect-azure` to use this block.
azureml-credentials.code_example:
Load stored AzureML credentials:
```python
from prefect_azure import AzureMlCredentials
azure_ml_credentials_block = AzureMlCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.description:
Block used to manage authentication with AzureML. Azure authentication is
handled via the `azure` module.

tenant_id.description: The active directory tenant that the service identity belongs to.
tenant_id.title: Tenant Id

subscription_id.description: The Azure subscription ID containing the workspace, in format: '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'.
subscription_id.title: Subscription Id

resource_group.description: The resource group containing the workspace.
resource_group.title: Resource Group

fields.title: AzureMlCredentials
